other_tests.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay. (Reference Range-Negative).

Small bilateral nonhemorrhagic pleural effusions with associated atelectasis; gallbladder contains a percutaneous cholecystostomy tube, not fully decompressed, with decreased inflammation. Previously seen ascites has decreased. Increased inflammation surrounding the pancreas.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Degree of inflammation around gallbladder has decreased; previously seen ascites has decreased; fluid around the pancreatic body and head is starting to organize.
